dc:title: On Pilgrimage - June 1959
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Struggles with "the dumps", finding new quarters and car troubles oin her way to Vermont to visit Tamar and her family. Graphic description of life at their farm. Ponders how to promote religious expression in a busy family.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 752 1959-06-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
